div.div:
Clarence - June 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 3.3.1
Seldom miss any notifications ever since...
It works as intended that I have become busier ever since I had this app installed.

Allan - July 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 3.3.1
Nice notification app
Good app. Would like an option to enable clicking the widget to open the monitored apps when there are no notifications present. Would make the widget a better experience

Gokay - June 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.3.1
No refund
Uninstalled in less than 15 mins but didn't give a refund.

Lanhoj - June 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.3.1
Works great!!
I use it along with: TeslaUnread LightFlow NotifierPro Plus & StatusBar+ Can't live without it!

Justin - June 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.3.1
Nova launcher
Lets me have notification badges like my iphone had with nova launcher

Jay - June 20, 2012 - Version 3.3.1
Cool idea but flawed
I liked this app at first but started noticing flaws like having to completely reboot my phone in order to clear call log. Notifications come in properly for most elements, and all clear after checking, except for call history. I have tried actually calling the missed number back, clearing it from call log history. Only way to clear a missed call notification is to reboot my phone. Kind of renders the app entirely useless.

scott - July 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 3.3.1
Good app, serious flaw
I love the functionality but the fact that it says "the folder is open" even I click on a folder is horribly annoying. I have followed your suggestions making sure that the two options in accessibility are turned off. Fix this and you have a 5 star app. Otherwise it is useless because of how annoying it is.

Lok Hang - June 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.3.1
Force close on s2
Keep on force closing when i tried to use my presets made in former versions.

Rob - June 22, 2012 - Version 3.3.1
Five Stars when we can use icons
I'd love to use icons instead of text. Can you make this happen?

dwardu - June 19, 2012 - Version 3.3.1
Need to remove the voice notifications
Everytime i open a folder and missed it is on with accessibility, the phone says "folder open/closed" how can i remove this?

Bruno - June 15, 2012 - Version 3.3
Nova Launcher
How do I make it work with Nova Launcher?

Scott - June 17, 2012 - Version 3.3
Terrible
Continuously crashes and doesn't work. Doesn't even Gabe the options mentioned in the tutorial. No monitored elements tab in my version if the program

Solenoid - June 9, 2012 - HTC G2 with version 3.2.1
A killer app
Using it with widget locker is great. A very functional apps but a bit hard to config. Not very userfriendly for beginners. But once running its great. Widget are user designed, great!

Abtin - May 25, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 3.2.1
Worked ok till ics
This doesn't work with Gmail anymore. Says I need to update gmail app but I have the latest.

mysiak - June 8, 2012 - Version 3.2.1
ICS and gmail
Very nice app, using it together with WidgetLocker. Those having issue with gmail notifications after upgrading to ICS and new Gmail version, reinstall the Missed it! application, it will work nicely then.

Sahil - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.2.1
Under-cooked App...Refund pls!
I would like a refund pls, but there is no way to email the developer...the app is good in concept but that's where it stops...it randomly shows unread msgs (when infact there are none)...shows "checking licenses" frequently and for long periods...and the most crucial - it does not show notifications at the lock-up screen. If the developer is reading this, i would like my refund pls.

ovdv - May 18, 2012 - Version 3.2.1
Awesome
Works very well, very easy to use compared to Minimalistic Text

Hahn - May 25, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 3.2.1
not good.
I purchased this after reading about nova launcher support, I don't use the widget, only with nova, gmail counts does not always get cleared properly, thought setting it as foreground service would help but it places an icon in task bar and notification, bugs the hell out of me, please make the icon optional!or you can actually make it do something(show missed counts?) instead of going into setup.

D4 - May 31, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.2.1
Awesome.
Does exactly what it says - SGSII ICS. The licence check is annoying though, would be much better if it was done in the background.

Scott - May 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.2
Love it
Awesome application easy to use & customisable to boot you can't go wrong ;-) if you want it on your lock screen install one that supports widgets like widgetlocker!

Michael - May 15, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 3.2
Great utility
Excellent for building a "glanceable" summary of updates on my homescreen without having to pull down the notification bar!

Erich - May 17, 2012 - HTC One X with version 3.2
5 Stars!
A must for anyone using the WidgetLocker app.

junior - May 16, 2012 - Version 3.2
Tom
Awesome simple app!

WiFi - May 16, 2012 - Version 3.2
Gteat app

Woody - May 3, 2012 - Version 3.1.3
On the Galaxy Nexus
It only works as a widget on my homescreen but wont show at all on the locked screen. Spent a hour and got bored so removed it

Jada - May 12, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 3.1.3
Only ok
Works fine for some apps but I just can't get it to pick up any calendar notifications.

Raz - May 14, 2012 - Version 3.1.3
Force closes on SGSII after ICS update. Used to eorg grest on gingerbread.

Quintas - May 11, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.1.3
Gmail
Gmail notification don´t work...

Alex - May 5, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 3.1.3
Great app
Since the last update I can't change the default text messaging app it opens with...

Tom - May 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.1.3
The must have
Partner to Widget Locker.

Prem - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.1.3
Good
Awesome widget, makes for a cool lock screen

Almir - May 5, 2012 - Version 3.1.3
New permissions...
Fuark. Zyzz brah. U mirin aesthetics son?

Langston - May 2, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 3.1.3
Good program
Nice features and helpful dev. The latest 3.1.3 version is working great with the new Gmail API.

jbes - May 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.1.3
Works fine
Except for gmail always tells me I need to update for notifications to work even though I'm updated

Allen - May 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.1.3
.
Love this app because it does what it said it does and it look awesome and simple!

Miguel - April 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.1.2
:(
Doesn't even work crashes on me ...galaxy nexus 4.0.4

Alberto - May 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 3.1.2
Doesnt work at all.
It only works as a widget on my homescreen but wont show at all on the locked screen. Epic 4G

Zach Kinion - April 30, 2012 - Version 3.1.2
Sgs2 issue
Worked great but now after the last update I don't get Gmail notifications. I'm on an att galaxy s 2.

Roger - May 1, 2012 - Version 3.1.2
Pretty good
It works pretty good, my only complaint is for facebook notifications, it opens the camera app

Ryan - April 28, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 3.1.2
3rd Party Email Fixed!
Last update fixed all my issues. Great app!

Elvin - April 27, 2012 - Version 3.1.2
Awesome
Great app! And great customer support. Quick to reply.

Golf - April 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.1.2
..
Still have problem with facebook

Matthew - April 26, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 3.1.1
Question
I like the app concept. It does take some time to figure out, but thats part of the fun. I do have one code I cannot break. I cannot get the background to NOT show. Can anyone help with that please?

Dreaming Sheep - April 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.1
Works a treat!
Love this app! It does what it says on the tin and works brilliantly when placed on my lockscreen. @Golf - Have you tried going to Appearance > Color (under the background title)? Works fine for me. @twitter... - Make sure it's a ttf file in \sdcard\fonts. Mine show up fine, also make sure it's in your internal memory for your phone (your SD card is reported as \sdcard\external_sd\fonts).

Adam - April 25, 2012 - Version 3.1
Perfect! I use it right on the home screen.
It is easy to configure and highly customizable! Disregard all the negativity, trust me. Their is no better all in one notification counter widget. Thanks developers!

Josh - April 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.1
Awful licensing checks
Great app but the constant licensing checks are ridiculous, especially because it NEVER WORKS. So basically this is an app that only works when it feels like it, but you still pay for it.

László - April 20, 2012 - Motorola Defy with version 3.1
Refreshing gmail number
The new (3.1) version Gmail numbers not refreshing in the widget, When i enter and quit the appication the number is refreshing. The previous version had no such problem, although it is another method used to gmail account.

Mark - April 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.1
Getting there!
A great app but I'd like different size Widgets (2x1 and 1x1).

KingCannon - April 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.1
Hopeless
More bugs than in a rainforest. 165 unread emails? Really?

Adnan - April 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.1
Nexus
Works fine.

Pinklub - March 22, 2012 - Version 3.0.5
I buy and pay
This app don,t work in my GT-i9100 version 4.0.3 GBL Repair hurry up Thank you

twitter.com/_crisismakeup - April 2, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 3.0.5
Fonts
It says I can use my own from the SD card but none of my fonts are available when I go to choose. Only serif, sans, monospace, etc.

Anshu - April 6, 2012 - Version 3.0.5
Use this for Google Voice counters!
This app can count how many times any application creates a notification. There are many people (including me and my friends) who have been looking for a clean way to show how many missed texts/voicemails we had from Google Voice and this app does that perfectly (assuming you don't care the count is the sum of texts and voicemails). Great replacement for (large and ugly) Google Voice widget! Dev should market this feature more since Google has not opened up the GVoice API and there are tons of bad apps out there that claim to do this, but fail or implement it poorly!

Jasmine - February 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.0.5
Don't update if u havn't yet!
It stops working after update. It won't even count! Please change it back to the previous version So it can function properly.

Peter - April 11, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 3.0.5
Worth it!
A little bit of a learning curve with this app, but the functionality is definitely there. Wish we could have icons next to the counters.

Lucas - April 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.5
No save?
Would not allow me to save my presets ... big downer for me ...

Chase - March 14, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 3.0.5
Awesome App!
Using this widget on my lock screen with WidgetLocker. Works like a charm & has a lot of options for customization.

Robert - March 16, 2012 - Version 3.0.5
Good but as others have said
Gmail, phone call are displayed ok, but carrier email client email numbers are displayed incorrectly at the minute. Still nice though!

MICHAEL - March 26, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 3.0.5
VERY CUSTOMIZABLE
One of my favorite apps. In my top 5, easy. Updates are always good. Visit the forum. Post screenshots.

Alien - March 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.5
Great apps!
But it crash on samsung i9100 with ics4.0, please fix.

vanessaem - March 25, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 3.0.5
Nice app.
I don't get the low ratings. The app works great.

scotty - March 21, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 3.0.5
Greatness!!!
Use this with widget locker for an awesome lock screen.

Jordan - March 10, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 3.0.5
Awesome.
Works great.

PIMP - February 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.5
Works great
Galaxy s2

Denny - February 13, 2012 - Version 3.0.4
SMS count wrong
- Difficult/quirky to configure - SMS count wrong(doubled up) When configuring background color, I notice that upon configuring alpha(transparency), sometimes the setting doesn't "take". So you'd have to go back to adjust it. Tested SMS and the app doubles up on the true count, which is a bug that needs to be addressed.

Marshall - February 1, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 3.0.4
Was GREAT before most recent update
Previously reviewed MissedIt! and gave it one star for the bad update. After toying around with it for a while, i was finally able to rebuild my old widgets. That being said, dealing with the templates and the "defaults" is still very confusing and the app is overall more difficult to figure out. Wish things were like they were before 3.0.

Sam - February 2, 2012 - Version 3.0.4
Excellent
Excellent app, very customizable. Move feature being able to save as preset. Better menu structure. Thanks

Rory - February 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.0.4
Great app
Worth every penny.

pcc - February 8, 2012 - Version 3.0.4
Great
Very helpful to see notifications

johncf - January 26, 2012 - Version 3.0.3
Good
I think alot of people are been harsh here, granted it took a few moments to get to grips with how its laid out, but it works a treat. Once you work out your way round the menus its becomes easy. i would however like to se the tap to edit return. htc sensation, launcher pro, widget locker

sang - January 22, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 3.0.3
Back to Good
Rated it one star previously for the update that requires redoing all the customization but after redoing everything, it back to good. Still poss with the non backward compatibility.

Rob - January 27, 2012 - HTC Desire S with version 3.0.3
Good in priciple
But the preset settings not loading is a bit of a dissapointment. Regret updating without backing up first but happy with widget overall.

lunzi88 - January 25, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 3.0.3
It used to worked well.
Ever since i've updated the app, it no longer updates the notifications properly. It'll remain one star until it's fixed

Al - January 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.3
Bad Update
the new update is horrible.. not only does it not save your previous settings, it's impossible to reconstruct it back to what you had. the presets don't even work. what a waste.

Martin - January 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.3
Presets no longer work
I cant get the app to load any presets after the update..

con5tant - January 24, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 3.0.3
Needs fixing
New update makes it very confusing. Please update again or go back to the way it was

Topher - January 21, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 3.0.2
Losing transparency now fixed
Latest update fixed my issues. Not fond of recreating my widgets... but I can get passed that.

Michael - January 22, 2012 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 3.0.2
More trouble than it's worth.
I had a perfectly nice widget on my lockscreen. Now I have to waste time figuring out how to rebuild it using a much more complicated system. Gee, thanks.

Larry - January 24, 2012 - Version 3.0.2
Ok
- Good

Dsiglin - January 20, 2012 - Version 3.0.1
Easy to use yet powerful
This app is an essential companion to any lockscreen. Easy to use but powerful control over notifications. Develepor is responsive and active.

James - January 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.1
update works for me
I too use this with widgetlocker and so far, so good. I certainly haven't seen any of the problems mentioned elsewhere. 4 stars only because i had to remake the widget

Ceejay - January 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 3.0.1
Update at your own risk!
Used to be perfect, now its full of bugs but can be made to function after a lot of tinkering. Shadow no longer works no matter what you try though!

Jason - January 17, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 3.0.1
Update resets everything.
Want to start with a clean slate and not have those pesky personal settings remain? Then I highly recommend this update. Seriously though, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE UPDATE.

Carlo - January 21, 2012 - HTC G2 with version 3.0.1
great app!
This app is essential, it should be included in android by default, stupid slide down notification bar

Dave - January 18, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Arc with version 3.0.1
Why why why
Lost all previous setups and cannot even get the templates to load now either. Wish I hadn't updated now.

Rachel - January 19, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 3.0.1
Edit
Bring back tap widget to edit!

Michael - January 19, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 3.0.1
Please allow for tabs
Please allow for tabs to be inserted instead of only new lines

Edward - October 21, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
Essential widget!
Love it! All work perfectly for me - mail (exchange), gmail, whatsapp and missed calls htc sensation 4g.

daniel - January 1, 2012 - HTC Desire S with version 2.1.0
Awesome app
Totally changed the way I use my android. Unlike iPhones, many android apps don't have the option to have notification badges. As a result, I uses to miss a whole bunch of stuff. Not anymore! Thanks, Missed It!

thunderror - June 8, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Ace with version 2.1.0
Awesome app. As good as minimalist text.
Just wish the third party notifications would reset to zero when they're gone. I have 37 whatsapp notifications still? and they will only increase. Until I reset the whole widget. How about getting this right? Thanks.

Ghengis - November 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Amazing.
Everything works great on my GS2. Works on the new Gmail, you just have to add it like you do with the other apps. If it's not working for you, it's probably user error.

PWF - August 3, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 2.1.0
Stopped working
Work perfectly but now FC's all the time. Nexus S running CM7 and GO Launcher EX

Adam - December 18, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.1.0
Great on D2 but lacking on Google Nexus with ICS
For my D2, worked mostly with standard text messaging and missed calls, but not Talk or Gmail. Same w/ my G. Nexus but missing color change options

Ehren - October 12, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G Slide with version 2.1.0
Neat app!
Would be nice if they'd figure out a work-around for the gmail counter..

Tim - July 29, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 2.1.0
Uh oh...
Looks like the new Gmail update broke this...hopefully there's a fix soon...won't show up and force closes in the settings menu...doh!

Kon - October 28, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
Great app
Awesome, don't forget to enable access from settings!

Cesar - December 11, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
What is the No Alarm Widget in the screen capture?
Hi Working perfectly on my Note, would like to know which one is the "No Alarm" widget on the 1st pic.

Halcyon - December 15, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Good and works
Please allow removal of default message and missed calls as some may be using third party apps. Other than that, would be good to have some themes.

Michael - December 23, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Mini with version 2.1.0
Good but...
Doesn't work with whatsapp despite showing it in one of the screenshots. Fine for texts and calls though.

Gren - July 17, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 2.1.0
Nice widget. Could use a few more options

Kerri - August 1, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.1.0
Latest update = no help
Installed the latest update to fix the Gmail/Google issue. Have Gmail set as a monitored app, but emails parameter still won't display on the widget.

Eric - July 30, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 2.1.0
Will NOT work
this widget was amazing. Just force closes now all the time. Will not work. Sensation 4g.

Christine - November 22, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.1.0
Good but
Please allow HTC users to remove default msg program from monitored. When using 3rd party msg app, annoying menu appears when I click notification..

Jerome - December 6, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Arc with version 2.1.0
Whatsapp works with click the accessibility setting
Work great with many custom setting. Great app!

Dickie - July 29, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.1.0
Oops
Updated most recent gmail app and now missed it FC constantly. Will uninstall and reinstall to see if this fixes issue, if not please update.Evo 4g

ministroni - December 29, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
Good
but I can't monitor yahoo mail and exchange mail notifications at the same time because they have the same name.

Michal - November 18, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
Great!
Great app. Especially with moded gmail app from xda - reverts old api :)

Eduardo Peixoto - December 19, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.1.0
The numbers are often incorrect
Great app, offers tons of customization. However, the number of notifications is often incorrect (on ICS, at least).

Gnack - October 13, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Samsungs Galaxy S2
Easy to use and does exactly what it claims!

Ron - July 31, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Used to work great
Used to work great On original galaxy s. Keeps force closing on galaxy s2. Can't even open up the settings menu without a force close.

ian - June 24, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
Ignore my review below..
This was an issue with GOOGLE and NOT with this app. I have now installed and its great.

Miguel - August 1, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.1.0
Update messed up
Update made the missed mail look funny.

Richard - July 29, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.1.0
Gmail update has broken it
superb widget, love it, but the new Gmail update has broken it and it's force closing all the time now, hope the dev can fix it

suzlyn - July 13, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.1.0
I like this app (the idea of it anyway). It only gives me a ...
I like this app (the idea of it anyway). It only gives me a notification maybe 10% of the time, if that. Fix it for 5 stars. Samsung Fascinate,rooted.

Luis Felipe - October 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Good.
Was able to make it work.

Rich - November 5, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
OK ish
doesn't work with latest Gmail client

dzukri - January 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 2.1.0
It werks
But keep on force closing when I end a call

Ed - November 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Some features work
SMD works Missed calls - work All other applications do not work. GS 2

SeaWaLK - July 29, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Force close
Keep Force close when I click on monitored elements. Galaxy s2.

Charles - October 26, 2011 - Version 2.1.0
SG2
Works like a charm

Tommi - October 13, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Missed it
Best widget you can get for your phone. Couldn't live without.

Nick - October 12, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 2.1.0
Great widget!
I just noticed that in your scresnshot Swollen Members is playing, rock on!

paul - July 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.1.0
Great widget

Kirsten - July 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Good App

Aaron - July 30, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 2.1.0
Great widget.
The new gmail update seems to have broken this.

yowan - January 6, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.1.0
No problems
Works as it should

Robert - October 30, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.1.0
Meh
It's alright

Douglas - November 11, 2011 - Casio G'zOne Commando with version 2.1.0
Sucks
Out loud

Lighthouse - October 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.1.0
Great Product

Brice - July 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.1.0
Still not updating on samsung vibrant.

CzuD - December 27, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 2.1.0
Like it

Edvard - September 22, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.0.0
Works perfectly. Does not work with Gmail 2.3.5 but that is Googles fault. I'm ...
Works perfectly. Does not work with Gmail 2.3.5 but that is Googles fault. I'm running gmail 2.3.4.1 and am very happy. ;-)

Braunwyne - July 21, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 2.0.0
July 20th, New update completely fixed the no updating bug. Once again my most ...
July 20th, New update completely fixed the no updating bug. Once again my most used app. :-)

Eric - September 23, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 2.0.0
Didn't miss my calls 'n texts
Wish there was support for more apps, but works great! Be sure to enable it in the Accessibility menu!

Brandon - September 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.0.0
Galaxy S II Epic 4G Touch
What a great idea for an app, unfortunately the execution isn't spot on. It works for messages and gmail and calls but I was unable to get any other apps to work with it, even after going to the accessibility menu and activating it as suggested. Really all I want is for it to work with Calls and Social Hub since the Social Hub includes sms messages, facebook, twitter, and all of my mail accounts in once place. Would be the ultimate in simplicity. I don't want to clutter the screen with 5 dif email accounts.

nhninun - October 11, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 2.0.0
Great except I cannot hide background with a missed notification

Worm - July 29, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 2.0.0
Used to be great
Past couple updates the widget refuses to update. Developer was not helpful in email either. Such a shame

Cim - September 23, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Arc with version 2.0.0
The idea is great, but it's a bit complicated and it refuses to work ...
The idea is great, but it's a bit complicated and it refuses to work with Sonyericssons apps for e-mail, texting and calling.

Victor - August 25, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.5.3
Very happy. Were else can you get a 1x1 widget with notifications on Calls, ...
Very happy. Were else can you get a 1x1 widget with notifications on Calls, Msgs, Talks and Mails for my 2 gmail accounts. Nice work.

vital3d - August 2, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.5.3
Keep looking...
Has the developer ever heard of quality assurance or point releases? Updates everyday, breaks more everyday. Such a waste.

Godslayer - August 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.5.3
Unable to backup on GS2! Crap!

Jenn - September 23, 2011 - Version 1.5.3
Bugs
I really really love the idea of this app, but it has a lot of bugs & flaws. Force closes when you click a message. HTC Merge.

Shaun - July 17, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.5.3
Great for homescreen/lockscreen modders.
Developer updates this app, like, every week! Could someone tell me how to set up Missed It like in the second screenshot?

Murph - July 14, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.5.3
Widget works for one notification, then stops and sits on zero new notifications ...
Widget works for one notification, then stops and sits on zero new notifications even when receiving new notifications - htc incredible

Kristo - July 17, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.5.3
.
For this widget to work correctly you'll have to enable the accessibility from the phones settings.

B - July 17, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.5.3
Every time app is updated (which of late occurs too often), the widget disappears ...
Every time app is updated (which of late occurs too often), the widget disappears from my home screen. Annoying.

Nathan - September 6, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.5.3
Won't display Missed Gmail,buggy
Seems very flaky. Won't accept changes unless I remove the Widget and re-add it. Also won't display missed Gmail, only calls and Messages. Can't get help from anywhere. Annoying but good idea.

Ted - August 13, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.5.3
Fad
Well supported, works as advertised. Atrix 4g

Eric - August 23, 2011 - Version 1.5.3
Great App...
Great App - works with Gmail 2.3.5 update after a little tweaking...

Tony Clark - August 16, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.5.3
License Checking Issues
The license check causes notifications to stick even after checking.

Robbie - September 19, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.5.3
Mostly works, but
does not work with whatsapp or gmail

Ron - September 25, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.5.3

div.p: This is a nice idea, but it has a few problems. Firstly it really needs some documentation, ideally somewhere that is easy to find. And secondly it seems to cause random reboots on my GSM GNex (Stock, 4.0.2), although this is purely my speculation and I have no hard data. But, the application does what it's supposed to do, is fairly easy to figure out and works pretty well. Add icons, documentation and look into the ICS reboot issue, and it will be much better.
